attributes.action: Recognise Palestine as a full nation according to the 1967 borders
attributes.additional_details:
We as British citizens who believe in peace and security demand that Palestine is recognised as a full state according to the 1967 borders as agreed by UN resolution 242, immediately, thus rendering the Palestinian territory as a state and thereafter allowing the prevention of UK citizens fighting for the IDF and committing breaches of human rights.

As the law stands you can murder and possess land illegally against the Palestinians as the UK does not recognise it as a state.
